name: Pitch Black Panic
description:
Pitch Black Panic is a rhythm game about fear; part of Gamemaker's Toolkit Gamejam.

The idea was to make as many mechanics as multipurpose as possible.

  • Moving preserves your timer.
  • The timer is linked to your health, your vision radius, and the games rhythm.
  • Lights protect you from monsters, allow you to stop moving, and also offer additional vision.
